articles.description: Parler's lawyer, David Groesbeck, argued during the hearing Thursday that the company would suffer irreparable harm if it was forced to permanently close and that it is in the public interest to restore the platform's service.
articles.content:
Judge Barbara Rothstein is set to make a decision "soon" following the conclusion of the first hearing in Parler'slitigation against Amazon Thursday.
Parler filed the lawsuit against the tech giant … [+3018 chars]

articles.title: Christopher & Banks is going out of business - CNN

articles.title: Delta turned record profit into a record loss in one year - CNN
